resources.string:
Type of diabetes:
 T1DM, T2DM, prediabetes

 Exercise pattern:
 Moderate-or vigorous intensity aerobic activity, width vigorous, muscle-strengthening and born-strengthening activities

 Duration:
 At least 60 minutes per day (3 days per week)

Type of diabetes:
 T1DM, T2DM, prediabetes

 Exercise pattern:
 Moderate-or vigorous intensity physical activity prolonged sitting should be interrupted every 30 min for maintaining BSL

 Duration:
 At least 150min/week (with no more than 2 consecutive days without activity)

Type of diabetes:
 T1DM, T2DM

 Exercise pattern:
 Flexibility training balance training, yoga

 Duration:
 At least 30 min/day (2/3 times/week)
